Text.Page:
Why isn't he here? I know these tunnels go on forever, but that doesn't mean I can wait forever!

, if you're not busy, can you go to the crypt and check on Eudon?

Oldest story in the world. Guy gets sent to deliver rations to the scouts in the crypt, but doesn't come back on schedule.

And on your way, make sure something bad happens to the hellhounds wandering around. Hard to do your duty when the endless baying prevents an honest sleep!

You're from Elenea, ?

Yeah, yeah, I know I'm overdue.

Is it so hard to fathom why I got lost?
